comments: I\'ve had Quarterman for 2 years now. His class is probably the most entertaining class I\'ve had at Howard. He always seems to have an amazing story about his life and its relation to whatever we may be discussing at the time. His class is more of a lecture but once every week we are required to complete an assignment. He is Joy! take this class!
TAKE HIS CLASS!!! IF YOU DONT YOU MISSING OUT! ENERGIZING CLASS OF THE DAY,,,I LEARNED SO MUCH BC IT WAS SO INTERESTING

HE IS AN AWESOME PROFESSOR!!! He literally takes you by the hand and it is really easy to get an A! A paper or two a week that discusses your opinion on the subject matter! He is very organized! Take this class!!! I enjoyed every minute of his class and hated when I was late because I\'d missed a great conversation

Dr. Quarterman is one of the best professors here at Howard University. He takes his timeout teach students about life and how ethics relate to our lives. Honestly I recommend students to take his class before they graduate from Howard. Dr. Quarterman class is not hard and all you is turn in all your assignments on time to get an A in the class.

Many people have their own opinions on Quarterman, many of them are negative, however I like him! He\'s older so a lot of his comments are off the wall or irrelevant. He is very picky on writing. He likes things done the same way each and every time. To get an A in his class, simply attend, and do all assignments in the correct format!
